title: Tantric Tales of Tibetan Lust
description: A tantalising tale filled with tantric tinctures and Tibetan love potions. An erotic adventure in an extremely exotic locale. A mystical land of lamas and snow-leopards, of seers and sorceresses. A land where the supernatural is still part of everyday life, where demons and deities manifest as consorts and concubines. A colourful patchwork of isolated cultures where slavery was always the norm, where tribal matriarchs enjoy sexual freedom and where even the most adventurous westerner can end up with a whole lot more than he bargained for.
author: Darby Jones
